subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Sheik Mansour bin Zayed al-Nahyan, whose investment group owns Manchester City and will pay for the New York City soccer club, has stayed largely out of day-to-day operations of the new team.
snippet: Sheik Mansour bin Zayed al-Nahyan, whose investment group owns Manchester City and will pay for the New York City soccer club, has stayed largely out of day-to-day operations of the new team.
